text:
She's never been one to shy away from a bold style statement.
And, true to form, Zoe Kravitz opted for a typically daring look as she attended the InStyle And Warner Bros. 73rd Annual Golden Globe Awards Afterparty in Los Angeles on Sunday night.
The 27-year-old entertainer revealed her braless chest and nipples as she donned an almost entirely sheer dress on the red carpet.
Scroll down for video
Daring to bare: Zoe Kravitz went braless in a racy sheer dress as she attended the InStyle And Warner Bros. 73rd Annual Golden Globe Awards Afterparty in Los Angeles on Sunday night
But, rather than it being an accidental reveal of her nipples, it seems the actress and musician was going for the shocking look deliberately.
Despite the reveal of almost her full breasts, the star's dress was overall rather classy, a sheer shift-style garment with a delicate golden weave pattern all over it.
Her slender curves were covered in the loose flowing number, before falling down over her enviable legs in a long fringed skirt with a hip-high split up the sides.
Thanks to its transparency, Divergent star Zoe - the daughter of rocker Lenny Kravitz and actress Lisa Bonet - also flashed her underpants, clearly not ready to go for a complete underwear-free look.
See more Golden Globes updates on the winners, red carpet fashion and afterparties
No holding back: The 27-year-old bravely flashed her bare chest, her nipples visible through the transparent fabric of the otherwise tasteful, golden gown
The directional darling kept the rest of her 1920s-inspired look simple, teaming the gorgeous gown with a pair of barely-there strappy black heels, a classic box clutch and dainty glitzy earrings.
And her look was made all the more edgy and fashion-forward thanks to the smattering of her tattoos on show on her arms and hands.
She happily posed alone on the red carpet at the post-Golden Globes party, not joined by her famous mother Lisa, who often accompanies her at showbiz events.
Zoe has clearly been blessed with her parents' finest attributes: not only is she a successful actress in her own right - with a role in 2015's epid film Mad Max: Fury Road under her belt - but she's also a model and musician, fronting R&B/electropop trio Lolawolf.
Showing some skin... and then some! The actress, model and musician showed off her enviable legs and slender figure in the gorgeous gown
Edgy as ever: The daughter of Lenny Kravitz and Lisa Bonet teamed her racy look with simple accessories, including barely-there heels and a classic black clutch
The outspoken star recently discussed how she reacts to people's opinions about her career, telling Wonderland magazine: 'I seriously do not give a s***.'
Speaking about her triple-threat career, she added: 'That was the way the entertainment industry started, if you really think about it.
'You used to have to be a triple threat to survive in Hollywood. You know, a Gene Kelly, or a Julie Andrews.'
Meanwhile, Zoe looked ready to party it up along with a handful of other stars who attended the InStyle bash on Sunday night, including Kate Hudson, Bella Thorne, Nina Dobrev, Vanessa Hudgens and Best Actress winner Brie Larson.
